internal.content: --- title: "Create Application" date: 2022-11-03T10:57:46+01:00 weight: 152 --- ## üöÄ TASK: Create RobotShop Application in Instana üåè Documentation for the Task: Creating an application perspective In this section you will create an Application Perspective for RobotShop instance using the following parameters: ```yaml Kind: Kubernetes or Container Filter: Kubernetes.Namespace = robot-shop ``` ## Create the connection 1. On `Instana` homepage click `New Applciation Perspective` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_app_01.png) 1. Select `Kubernetes or Container` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_app_02.png) 1. Click `Next` 1. Click on `+ Add Filter` 1. Type `namespace` in the search field 1. Select `robot-shop` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_app_03.png) 1. Click `Next` 1. Name your Application Perspective `RobotShop` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_app_04.png) 1. Click `Create` 1. After a short while you should see the application information ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_app_05.png) **Important - Data Collection takes some time** Data Collection can take 10-30 minutes.
